General.Name: Gansu Jiu Steel Group Hongxing Iron & Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Gansu Jiu Steel Group Hongxing Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd. produces and sells iron and steel and their rolled products in China, Europe, South Korea, Japan, the United States. The company provides wire rods, bars, plates, hot-rolled coils, cold-rolled plates and sheets, galvanized plates, alloy coated plates, and medium-thick plates. It also offers steel products, electrolytic aluminum equipment, manufacturing ferro alloys, and non-metallic materials; and engages in the wine, dairy, and public service industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Jiayuguan, China. Gansu Jiu Steel Group Hongxing Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiuquan Iron and Steel (Group) Co., Ltd.
